availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Keithly (Fleming County soldier; fought with William S. Beauchamp)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, soldier. Private in the Sixteenth Regiment Kentucky Volunteer Infantry from September 1861 to April 1862. Deserted from the Army in Prestonsburg, Kentucky, on April 16, 1862.

bibl.p: Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0293. KYR-0001-029-0133. KYR-0001-029-0135.
